original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Zebulun was Eliab the son of Helon.
korean_text: 스불론 자손 지파의 군대는 헬론의 아들 엘리압이 이끌었더라

sentences.original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Zebulun
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 스불론 자손 지파의 군대를 다스린 자는

sentences.original_text: was Eliab the son of Helon.
